posts.post_content:
I quite like this one, actually. Between it, [Umara Raptor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Umara Raptor) and [Halimar Excavator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Halimar Excavator), there are plenty of reasons to splash blue in your Ally build.  
  
But I think the most alluring thing to copy would probably be [Kazuul Warlord](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kazuul Warlord). Give all your Allies +2/+2 for each trigger? Yes, please.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
A [Clone](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Clone) for Ally decks at half the cost is definitely worth splashing.  
Although not meant for the early game, this will be an incredibly cheap drop later since you'll only have to pay ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol) for a duplicate of any other more expensive Ally in play you previously paid for.  
  
On top of this, Kev Walker once more did an amazing job on this card's artwork.
posts.html:
A Clone for Ally decks at half the cost is definitely worth splashing.
Although not meant for the early game, this will be an incredibly cheap drop later since you'll only have to pay for a duplicate of any other more expensive Ally in play you previously paid for.

On top of this, Kev Walker once more did an amazing job on this card's artwork.
